tool_description: API showing what newspapers from around the world say about Tesla.
name: Tesla - news and rumours
title: Tesla - news and rumours

api_list.name: Get all news about Tesla
api_list.description: This endpoint return all the newspapers articles about Tesla.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tesla-news-and-rumours.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tesla-news-and-rumours.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: News about Tesla from selected newspaper
api_list.description: This endpoint pick all the news about Tesla from the selected newspaper.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tesla-news-and-rumours.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tesla-news-and-rumours.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tesla-news-and-rumours.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tesla-news-and-rumours.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
